channel.title: Speeding up VM startup
channel.description:
A small tip that was suggested in a thread I saw was to disable dbus from looking for disabled services.If its simple and doesn't break anything it can be very convenient for starting up from a snapshot.
https://forum.siduction.org/index.php?topic=4259.0

item.title: Speeding up VM startup
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
It was based on the second post in the thread but I guess its too much of a hassle to bother.

Read full topic

item.title: Speeding up VM startup
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Is there any exact quote on how to do this?

systemctl masking whole dbus from startup is not a great default choice
for a distribution. Might be worth research/doing for advanced users
that know what they are doing.

Read full topic
